nodes.text: Skeletal clone troopers were specialized clone troopers in the Grand Army of the Republic. The overall armor resembled the Phase II clone trooper armor. As indicated by the name, their armor was primarily colored black, with white patterns placed throughout the body that resembled a human skeleton. They also carried scythe-staffs into battle.
The skeletal clone trooper was a purchasable outfit in the online game Star Wars: Clone Wars Adventures. Their use of scythes was a reference to the Grim Reaper, the personification of Death.
